title: Upright creature crosses road in the path of a car near Newington Forest
observed: I was driving down Pohick Road in Fairfax one evening, this animal walked out from behind a road sign, stopped, stared at me, then with one stride it was on the other side. He went into the woods.
location_details: Pohick Road at Newington Forrest just east of Magic Leaf Road, near Fort Belvoir.
